mapper.select: select q.q_num, q_category, m_id, q_contents, q_wdate, q_udate, q_del, q_subject ,(select count(qs.q_num) from qna_sub qs where q.q_num = qs.q_num and qs.qs_del = 'N') as reply_chk from qna q where q_del = 'N' order by q.q_num desc

select q.q_num, q_category, m_id, q_contents, to_char(q_udate,'yyyy-mm-dd') q_udate, q_subject ,qs_contents, to_char(qs_udate,'yyyy-mm-dd') qs_udate from qna q left join (select q_num, qs_contents, qs_udate from qna_sub qs where qs.qs_del = 'N') qs on q.q_num = qs.q_num where q_subject like '%'||#{q_subject}||'%' and q_del = 'N' order by q.q_num desc

select q_num, q_category, m_id, q_contents, q_wdate, q_udate, q_del, q_subject, reply_chk from ( select /*+ index_desc(q pk_q) */ rownum rn, q.q_num, q_category, m_id, q_contents, q_wdate, q_udate, q_del, q_subject ,(select count(qs.q_num) from qna_sub qs where q.q_num = qs.q_num and qs.qs_del = 'N') as reply_chk from qna q where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and q_del = 'N') where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: insert into qna (q_num, q_category, m_id, q_contents, q_wdate, q_udate, q_del, q_subject) values (seq_q.nextval, #{q_category}, #{m_id}, #{q_contents}, sysdate, sysdate, 'N', #{q_subject})
